A serverless tool to batch resize jpegs and upload them to ipfs as one object. More info here.


# This is a sample configuration file - feel free to edit this!

# Inline comments aren't currently supported
# Only constraining width
500x_
400x_
300x_

# Only constraining height

_x500
_x400
_x300



View on cloudflare gateway (this might take a minute or two to propagate):

  • Thumbnails
